code: import{useEffect}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import{BookOpen}from'lucide-react';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const{error}=useAuth();useEffect(()=>{const renderGoogleButton=()=>{if(window.google){const buttonDiv=document.getElementById('google-signin-button');if(buttonDiv&&!buttonDiv.hasChildNodes()){window.google.accounts.id.renderButton(buttonDiv,{theme:'outline',size:'large',text:'signin_with',shape:'rectangular',width:'280'});}}};if(window.google){setTimeout(renderGoogleButton,100);}else{const checkForGoogle=setInterval(()=>{if(window.google){clearInterval(checkForGoogle);setTimeout(renderGoogleButton,100);}},100);setTimeout(()=>clearInterval(checkForGoogle),5000);}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookOpen,{size:48})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"BookRecommender"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your personalized book discovery app"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Welcome!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Sign in to access your personalized book recommendations"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error-message",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["\u26A0\uFE0F ",error]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"signin-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"google-signin-button"})})]})]})});};export default Login;
